channel.name: QVC UK
channel.title: Gifting with Chelsea Peers
channel.desc: Discover Gifting with Chelsea Peers. From cosy loungewear to playful prints, find perfect presents that combine comfort, style, and a little festive fun for everyone.

channel.name: QVC UK
channel.title: Elemis The Gift Of Great Skin
channel.desc: We bring you the beauty of Elemis - famed for their premier spa and salon treatments. Tune in and discover incredible value skincare, perfect for gifting or treating yourself to.

channel.name: QVC UK
channel.title: Christmas Garden Centre
channel.desc: Welcome to the QVC Christmas Garden Centre and add some festive fun to your outdoor space! Immerse in a world of plants, gardening essentials, seasonal d?cor, and expert tips from the comfort of home.

channel.name: QVC UK
channel.title: Nightwear with Chelsea Peers
channel.desc: Beautiful fashion isn't just for the day! Elevate your nightwear with Chelsea Peers, offering a wide selection of sleepwear in gorgeous prints and super-soft fabrics. Catch some ZZZs in style.

channel.name: QVC UK
channel.title: My Hair Doctor
channel.desc: Join us for My Hair Doctor from Guy Parsons, an industry professional whose knowledge of hair and scalp health, plus his hairdressing skills has enabled him to create this premium haircare range.

channel.name: QVC UK
channel.title: Menopause Your Way
channel.desc: Join Jackie Kabler as she chats to our panel of experts and founders about the menopause, helping you navigate midlife on your terms. From inspiring stories to game-changing products, tune in today.

channel.name: QVC UK
channel.title: Molton Brown
channel.desc: Awaken your senses with fragrance experts Molton Brown, London's bath, body and beauty connoisseurs since 1973. Indulge in exquisitely crafted blends brought to you by Molton Brown, London.

channel.title: New Season White Stuff

channel.name: QVC UK
channel.title: Rieker Footwear
channel.desc: Rieker offers footwear designed to be flexible, roomy, light and well cushioned. Following trends in the marketplace, Rieker provides classic footwear to women of all ages.

channel.name: QVC UK
channel.title: Kuhn Rikon Kitchen Gadgets
channel.desc: Add a splash of colour to your kitchen with these high-quality tools, utensils and gadgets. This Swiss brand prides itself on durability, style and craftsmanship.

channel.title: Australian Bodycare
channel.desc: This Australian Bodycare range is inspired by the ancient traditions of the Aborigines who discovered the effects of natural ingredients. Find cleansing and caring products for your skin.

channel.name: QVC UK
channel.title: Cozee Home
channel.desc: Create a warm and cosy sanctuary in your home, with the Cozee Home range of snuggly bedding, throws and accessories offering comfort and coziness in your home.[(96057)]
